item.title: Orson Welles’ Lost Movie Will Use AI to Reconstruct Missing 43 Minutes
item.description: Amazon-backed firm Showrunner, led by Edward Saatchi, is using the film as a test case for how Hollywood can overhaul production. The results won’t be commercialized — the tech giant hasn’t obtained r
